how.question: How does it work?
how.step1Desc: Select your industry and price tier to instantly see key KPIs and market standards. No signup required.
how.step2Desc: Enter your own KPIs to see how you stack up, then generate personalized AI insights to improve your strategy.

what.question: What will I learn?
what.answer1: Discover how your marketing KPIs compare to industry leaders in your sector and price tier.
what.answer2: Get instant visual feedback (green/yellow/red) on each metric, plus AI-powered strategic recommendations tailored to your specific situation.

data.question: Can I trust this data?
data.intro: Our benchmarks are curated and validated by industry experts:
data.note: Data is segmented by industry and price tier to ensure relevant comparisons.

sidebar.step1Desc: Pick your sector and price tier — we'll show relevant benchmarks.
sidebar.step2Desc: Enter your metrics and get personalized AI recommendations.
sidebar.readyDesc: Fill in your metrics in the grid, then click "Generate AI Analysis" at the bottom of the page.

cac.name: Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)
cac.description: Total marketing spend divided by new customers acquired.

roas.name: Blended ROAS
roas.description: Total revenue divided by total marketing spend.

marketing_spend.name: Marketing Spend % of Revenue
marketing_spend.description: Percentage of revenue allocated to marketing.

ltv_cac.name: LTV:CAC Ratio
ltv_cac.description: Customer lifetime value divided by acquisition cost.

mer.name: Marketing Efficiency Ratio (MER)
mer.description: Total revenue divided by total marketing spend.

conv_rate.name: Conversion Rate
conv_rate.description: Percentage of visitors who complete a purchase.

cart_abandonment.name: Cart Abandonment Rate
cart_abandonment.description: Percentage of carts abandoned before checkout.

email_revenue.name: Email Revenue Share
email_revenue.description: Percentage of revenue from email marketing.

sms_revenue.name: SMS Revenue Share
sms_revenue.description: Percentage of revenue from SMS marketing.

repeat_rate.name: Repeat Purchase Rate
repeat_rate.description: Percentage of customers who make more than one purchase.

purchase_frequency.name: Purchase Frequency
purchase_frequency.description: Average number of purchases per customer per year.

churn_rate.name: Churn Rate
churn_rate.description: Percentage of customers who stop buying.

ltv.name: Customer Lifetime Value (LTV)
ltv.description: Total revenue expected from a customer over their lifetime.

gross_margin.name: Gross Margin
gross_margin.description: Revenue minus cost of goods sold, as percentage.

lead_conv.name: Lead-to-Customer Rate
lead_conv.description: Percentage of leads that become customers.

sql_rate.name: SQL Conversion Rate
sql_rate.description: Percentage of MQLs that become Sales Qualified Leads.

sales_cycle.name: Sales Cycle Length
sales_cycle.description: Average days from first contact to closed deal.

nrr.name: Net Revenue Retention (NRR)
nrr.description: Revenue retained from existing customers including expansion.

expansion_revenue.name: Expansion Revenue
expansion_revenue.description: Revenue from upsells and cross-sells to existing customers.

cac_payback.name: CAC Payback Period
cac_payback.description: Months to recover customer acquisition cost.

benchmark.moveSlider: Move the slider to set your value

analysis.title: AI Analysis
analysis.comparingDataDesc: Examining thousands of data points from similar businesses.
analysis.findingOpportunitiesDesc: Finding the best growth levers for your business.
analysis.craftingRecsDesc: Almost there! Generating your personalized strategic insights.
analysis.resultSubtitle: Personalized insights based on your data

banner.instruction: Pick metrics - Set values - Generate insights

contributors.epsilon: Marketing technology leader enabling personalized customer engagement. Contributed acquisition and retention metrics standards.
contributors.niji: French digital transformation consulting and technology company. Provided e-commerce conversion benchmarks and UX insights.
